attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks to the public only certified event organisers can buy.
attributes.background: Fireworks whilst lovely are the bane of pet owners lives. The week leading up to & after bonfire night & new years are a very stressful time. Too many people are letting them off in residential areas at inappropriate times & at different times during the year for events that only a few know about.

rejection.details:
Please note that the Government has recently responded to a petition on this issue and the Petitions Committee decided not to hold a debate on the sale of fireworks. More information can be found here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/168663
